title: Calling all dormobile / martin walker roof owners

posts.content:
monkey wrote:
Daves just dropped me a note to with the measurements..

They are .. Front 1180mm from the inside of opening to the gutter ( not to the gutter outer edge as it's hard to measure )
Rear... From inside to gutter 720mm ( measurement taken same as front )


All good, I got exactly the same measurements, measured from roof opening to the top of gutter, pretty much the only place to measure to.

OK - Dormy owners. I require another measurement. Unfortunately the mounting positions for the bellow rib bracket got wiped out when the half of the roof was replaced.

Could we try and get some measurements as to where they should be please?

I'm talking about the following:



I'm not sure what datum you'll need to use, but any useful measurement points and pictures like previously will be great.

Thanks folks!

Hi Matt

I had a look at the location of the holes you were asking about .......

If you look at the photo below (front of bus), measuring up from the roof gutter it is 180mm to bottom screw hole or 140mm from top of hinge to bottom screw hole. You can see the screw holes up in front of the roof opening. The distance from vertical angle iron at front of roof aperture, measures 60mm.

For the rear of the bus, the measurements were a little different, from the gutter to bottom screw hole it measures 187mm or from top of hinge 147mm. So, on my bus the 'bellow rib brackets' mount 7mm higher at the rear?? I have the same measure from angle iron/aperture opening to screws of 60mm. Both front and rear, the 2 screw holes are 33mm apart.

Hope this helps.

barndoorz wrote:
Hi Matt

I had a look at the location of the holes you were asking about .......

If you look at the photo below (front of bus), measuring up from the roof gutter it is 180mm to bottom screw hole or 140mm from top of hinge to bottom screw hole. You can see the screw holes up in front of the roof opening. The distance from vertical angle iron at front of roof aperture, measures 60mm.

For the rear of the bus, the measurements were a little different, from the gutter to bottom screw hole it measures 187mm or from top of hinge 147mm. So, on my bus the 'bellow rib brackets' mount 7mm higher at the rear?? I have the same measure from angle iron/aperture opening to screws of 60mm. Both front and rear, the 2 screw holes are 33mm apart.

Hope this helps.


Thanks mate. And are they just big old self tapping screws holding them in position?

monkey wrote:
Thanks mate. And are they just big old self tapping screws holding them in position?


Sorry, can't help there, I need the same question answered. Mine were removed when I got the bus.

Can any other Dormobile roof owner answer this for us?
